p: Sandalwood oil is highly appreciated, not only because of its exotic fragrance connotations and intensity but also because of its healing properties, which can be used in aromatherapy, for example. Natural oils, even those not derived from sandalwood, do not appear to pose a serious health risk. On the other hand, oils from plants other than the Santalum album will not have pharmacological effects appropriate for SAO. However, it should be emphasized that synthetic oils may contain compounds of not fully recognized biological properties, and which may be hazardous for the health of the user.
